response.json is the body of the following curl call:
-- req.sh --
curl -v -X POST http://localhost:11434/api/chat -d '{
"model": "llama3.2:1b",
"messages": [
    {
        "role": "user",
        "content": "tell me a joke"
    }
],
"stream": true
}'
